verses.verse: Again the word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came to me, <WH559> saying,
Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> cause Jerusalem <WH3389> to know <WH3045> her abominations; <WH8441>

and say, <WH559> Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh <WH136> to Jerusalem: <WH3389> Your birth <WH4351> and your birth <WH4138> is of the land <WH776> of the Canaanite; <WH3669> the Amorite <WH567> was your father, <WH1> and your mother <WH517> was a Hittite. <WH2850>

As for your birth, <WH4138> in the day <WH3117> you were born <WH3205> your navel <WH8270> was not cut, <WH3772> neither were you washed <WH7364> in water <WH4325> to cleanse <WH4935> you; <WH4414> you weren't salted at all, <WH4414> nor swaddled <WH2853> at all. <WH2853>

No eye <WH5869> pitied <WH2347> you, <WH6213> to do any <WH259> of these things to you, <WH2550> to have compassion on you; <WH7993> but you were cast out in the open <WH6440> field, <WH7704> for that your person <WH5315> was abhorred, <WH1604> in the day <WH3117> that you were born. <WH3205>

When I passed <WH5674> by you, <WH7200> and saw you wallowing <WH947> in your blood, <WH1818> I said <WH559> to you, <WH1818> Though you are in your blood, live; <WH2421> yes, <WH559> I said to you, <WH1818> Though you are in your blood, live. <WH2421>

I caused <WH5414> you to multiply <WH7233> as that which grows <WH6780> in the field, <WH7704> and you increased <WH7235> and grew great, <WH1431> and you attained <WH935> to excellent <WH5716> ornament; <WH5716> your breasts <WH7699> were fashioned, <WH3559> and your hair <WH8181> was grown; <WH6779> yet you were naked <WH5903> and bore. <WH6181>

Now when I passed <WH5674> by you, <WH7200> and looked at you, <WH6256> behold, your time was the time <WH6256> of love; <WH1730> and I spread <WH6566> my skirt <WH3671> over you, <WH3680> and covered your nakedness: <WH6172> yes, <WH7650> I swore to you, <WH935> and entered into a covenant <WH1285> with you, <WH5002> says the Lord <WH136> Yahweh, <WH3069> and you became mine.
Then washed <WH7364> I you with water; <WH4325> yes, <WH7857> I thoroughly washed away your blood <WH1818> from you, <WH5480> and I anointed you with oil. <WH8081>

I clothed <WH3847> you also with embroidered work, <WH7553> and shod <WH5274> you with sealskin, <WH8476> and I dressed <WH2280> you about with fine linen, <WH8336> and covered <WH3680> you with silk. <WH4897>
I decked <WH5710> you with ornaments, <WH5716> and I put <WH5414> bracelets <WH6781> on your hands, <WH3027> and a chain <WH7242> on your neck. <WH1627>
I put <WH5414> a ring <WH5141> on your nose, <WH639> and earrings <WH5694> in your ears, <WH241> and a beautiful <WH8597> crown <WH5850> on your head. <WH7218>

Thus you were decked <WH5710> with gold <WH2091> and silver; <WH3701> and your clothing <WH4403> was of fine linen, <WH8336> and silk, <WH4897> and embroidered work; <WH7553> you ate <WH398> fine flour, <WH5560> and honey, <WH1706> and oil; <WH8081> and you were exceedingly <WH3966> beautiful, <WH3302> and you prospered <WH6743> to royal estate. <WH4410>

Your renown <WH8034> went forth <WH3318> among the nations <WH1471> for your beauty; <WH3308> for it was perfect, <WH3632> through my majesty <WH1926> which I had put <WH7760> on you, <WH5002> says the Lord <WH136> Yahweh. <WH3069>

But you trusted <WH982> in your beauty, <WH3308> and played the prostitute <WH2181> because of your renown, <WH8034> and poured out <WH8210> your prostitution <WH8457> on everyone who passed by; <WH5674> his it was.

You took <WH3947> of your garments, <WH899> and made for yourselves high places <WH1116> decked <WH6213> with various colors, <WH2921> and played the prostitute <WH2181> on them: <WH935> the like things shall not come, neither shall it be so.

You also took <WH3947> your beautiful <WH8597> jewels <WH3627> of my gold <WH2091> and of my silver, <WH3701> which I had given <WH5414> you, <WH6213> and made for yourself images <WH6754> of men, <WH2145> and played the prostitute with them; <WH2181>
and you took <WH3947> your embroidered <WH7553> garments, <WH899> and covered <WH3680> them, <WH5414> and set my oil <WH8081> and my incense <WH7004> before them. <WH6440>

My bread <WH3899> also which I gave <WH5414> you, <WH5560> fine flour, and oil, <WH8081> and honey, <WH1706> with which I fed <WH398> you, <WH5414> you even set it before <WH6440> them for a pleasant <WH5207> aroma; <WH7381> and thus it was, <WH5002> says the Lord <WH136> Yahweh. <WH3069>

Moreover you have taken <WH3947> your sons <WH1121> and your daughters, <WH1323> whom you have borne <WH3205> to me, <WH2076> and you have sacrificed these to them to be devoured. <WH398> Was your prostitution <WH8457> a small matter, <WH4592>
that you have slain <WH7819> my sons, <WH1121> and delivered <WH5414> them up, <WH5674> in causing them to pass through the fire to them?

In all your abominations <WH8441> and your prostitution <WH8457> you have not remembered <WH2142> the days <WH3117> of your youth, <WH5271> when you were naked <WH5903> and bore, <WH6181> and were wallowing <WH947> in your blood. <WH1818>
It has happened after <WH310> all your wickedness, <WH7451> (woe, <WH188> woe <WH188> to you! <WH5002> says the Lord <WH136> Yahweh <WH3069>),
that you have built <WH1129> for yourselves a vaulted place, <WH1354> and have made <WH6213> yourselves a lofty place <WH7413> in every street. <WH7339>

You have built <WH1129> your lofty place <WH7413> at the head <WH7218> of every way, <WH1870> and have made your beauty <WH3308> a abomination, <WH8581> and have opened <WH6589> your feet <WH7272> to everyone who passed by, <WH5674> and multiplied <WH7235> your prostitution. <WH8457>

You have also committed sexual immorality <WH2181> with the Egyptians, <WH1121> your neighbors, <WH7934> great <WH1432> of flesh; <WH1320> and have multiplied <WH7235> your prostitution, <WH8457> to provoke me to anger. <WH3707>

See therefore, <WH5186> I have stretched out my hand <WH3027> over you, <WH1639> and have diminished your ordinary <WH2706> food, <WH5414> and delivered you to the will <WH5315> of those who hate <WH8130> you, <WH1323> the daughters of the Philistines, <WH6430> who are ashamed <WH3637> of your lewd <WH2154> way. <WH1870>

You have played the prostitute <WH2181> also with the Assyrians, <WH1121> because <WH1115> you were insatiable; <WH7646> yes, <WH2181> you have played the prostitute with them, <WH7654> and yet you weren't satisfied.
You have moreover multiplied <WH7235> your prostitution <WH8457> to the land <WH776> of merchants, <WH3667> to Chaldea; <WH3778> and yet you weren't <WH7646> satisfied with this. <WH2063>
How weak <WH535> is your heart, <WH3826> says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh, <WH136> since you do <WH6213> all these things, <WH4639> the work of a impudent <WH7986> <WH99999> prostitute; <WH2181>

in that you build <WH1129> your vaulted place <WH1354> at the head <WH7218> of every way, <WH1870> and make <WH6213> your lofty place <WH7413> in every street, <WH7339> and have not been as a prostitute, <WH2181> in that you scorn <WH7046> pay. <WH868>
A wife <WH802> who commits adultery! <WH5003> who takes <WH3947> strangers <WH2114> instead of her husband! <WH376>

They give <WH5414> gifts <WH5078> to all prostitutes; <WH2181> but you give <WH5414> your gifts <WH5083> to all your lovers, <WH157> and bribe <WH7809> them, <WH935> that they may come to you on every side <WH5439> for your prostitution. <WH8457>

You are different <WH2016> from other women <WH802> in your prostitution, <WH8457> in that no one follows <WH310> you to play the prostitute; <WH2181> and whereas you give <WH5414> hire, <WH868> and no hire <WH868> is given <WH5414> to you, <WH1961> therefore you are different. <WH2016>
Therefore, <WH2181> prostitute, hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of Yahweh: <WH3068>

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh, <WH3069> Because your filthiness <WH5178> was poured out, <WH8210> and your nakedness <WH6172> uncovered <WH1540> through your prostitution <WH8457> with your lovers; <WH157> and because of all the idols <WH1544> of your abominations, <WH8441> and for the blood <WH1818> of your sons, <WH1121> that you gave to them; <WH5414>

therefore see, <WH6908> I will gather all your lovers, <WH157> with whom you have taken pleasure, <WH6149> and all those who you have loved, <WH157> with all those who you have hated; <WH8130> I will even gather <WH6908> them against you on every side, <WH5439> and will uncover <WH1540> your nakedness <WH6172> to them, <WH7200> that they may see all your nakedness. <WH6172>

I will judge <WH8199> you, <WH5003> as women who break wedlock and shed <WH8210> blood <WH1818> are judged; <WH4941> and I will bring <WH5414> on you the blood <WH1818> of wrath <WH2534> and jealousy. <WH7068>

I will also give <WH5414> you into their hand, <WH3027> and they shall throw down <WH2040> your vaulted place, <WH1354> and break down <WH5422> your lofty places; <WH7413> and they shall strip <WH6584> you of your clothes, <WH899> and take <WH3947> your beautiful <WH8597> jewels; <WH3627> and they shall leave <WH3240> you naked <WH5903> and bore. <WH6181>
They shall also bring up <WH5927> a company <WH6951> against you, <WH7275> and they shall stone you with stones, <WH68> and thrust you through <WH1333> with their swords. <WH2719>

They shall burn <WH8313> your houses <WH1004> with fire, <WH784> and execute <WH6213> judgments <WH8201> on you in the sight <WH5869> of many <WH7227> women; <WH802> and I will cause you to cease <WH7673> from playing the prostitute, <WH2181> and you shall also give <WH5414> no hire any more. <WH868>
So will I cause my wrath <WH2534> toward you to rest, <WH5117> and my jealousy <WH7068> shall depart <WH5493> from you, <WH8252> and I will be quiet, and will be no more angry. <WH3707>

Because you have not remembered <WH2142> the days <WH3117> of your youth, <WH5271> but have raged <WH7264> against me in all these things; <WH1887> therefore, behold, I also will bring <WH5414> your way <WH1870> on your head, <WH7218> says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH136> and you shall not commit <WH6213> this lewdness <WH2154> with all your abominations. <WH8441>
Behold, <WH4911> everyone who uses proverbs shall use this proverb <WH4911> against you, <WH559> saying, As is the mother, <WH517> so is her daughter. <WH1323>

You are the daughter <WH1323> of your mother, <WH517> who loathes <WH1602> her husband <WH376> and her sons; <WH1121> and you are the sister <WH269> of your sisters, <WH269> who loathed <WH1602> their husbands <WH582> and their sons: <WH1121> your mother <WH517> was a Hittite, <WH2850> and your father <WH1> a Amorite. <WH567>

Your elder <WH1419> sister <WH269> is Samaria, <WH8111> who dwells <WH3427> at your left hand, <WH8040> she and her daughters; <WH1323> and your younger <WH6996> sister, <WH269> who dwells <WH3427> at your right hand, <WH3225> is Sodom <WH5467> and her daughters. <WH1323>

Yet have you not walked <WH1980> in their ways, <WH1870> nor done <WH6213> after their abominations; <WH8441> but, <WH6985> as if that were a very little <WH4592> thing, <WH7843> you were more corrupt than they <WH2004> in all your ways. <WH1870>

As I live, <WH2416> says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh, <WH3069> Sodom <WH5467> your sister <WH269> has not done, <WH6213> she nor her daughters, <WH1323> as you have done, <WH6213> you and your daughters. <WH1323>

Behold, <WH5771> this was the iniquity of your sister <WH269> Sodom: <WH5467> pride, <WH1347> fullness <WH7653> of bread, <WH3899> and prosperous <WH7962> ease <WH8252> was in her and in her daughters; <WH1323> neither did she strengthen <WH2388> the hand <WH3027> of the poor <WH6041> and needy. <WH34>
They were haughty, <WH1361> and committed <WH6213> abomination <WH8441> before <WH6440> me: <WH5493> therefore I took them away as I saw good. <WH7200>

Neither has Samaria <WH8111> committed <WH2398> half <WH2677> of your sins; <WH2403> but you have multiplied <WH7235> your abominations <WH8441> more than they, <WH2007> and have justified <WH6663> your sisters <WH269> by all your abominations <WH8441> which you have done. <WH6213>

You also, <WH5375> bear you your own shame, <WH3639> in that you have given judgment <WH6419> for your sisters; <WH269> through your sins <WH2403> that you have committed more abominable <WH8581> than they, <WH2004> they are more righteous <WH6663> that you: <WH954> yes, be also confounded, and bear <WH5375> your shame, <WH3639> in that you have justified <WH6663> your sisters. <WH269>

I will turn again <WH7725> their captivity, <WH7622> the captivity <WH7622> of Sodom <WH5467> and her daughters, <WH1323> and the captivity <WH7622> of Samaria <WH8111> and her daughters, <WH1323> and the captivity <WH7622> of your captives <WH7622> in their midst; <WH8432>
that you may bear <WH5375> your own shame, <WH3639> and may be ashamed <WH3637> because of all that you have done, <WH6213> in that you are a comfort to them. <WH5162>

Your sisters, <WH269> Sodom <WH5467> and her daughters, <WH1323> shall return <WH7725> to their former estate; <WH6927> and Samaria <WH8111> and her daughters <WH1323> shall return <WH7725> to their former estate; <WH6927> and you and your daughters <WH1323> shall return <WH7725> to your former estate. <WH6927>
For your sister <WH269> Sodom <WH5467> was not mentioned <WH8052> by your mouth <WH6310> in the day <WH3117> of your pride, <WH1347>

before your wickedness <WH7451> was uncovered, <WH1540> as at the time <WH6256> of the reproach <WH2781> of the daughters <WH1323> of Syria, <WH758> and of all who are around <WH5439> her, <WH1323> the daughters of the Philistines, <WH6430> who do despite <WH7590> to you all around. <WH5439>
You have borne <WH5375> your lewdness <WH2154> and your abominations, <WH8441> says <WH5002> Yahweh. <WH3068>

For thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> I will also deal <WH6213> with you as you have done, <WH6213> who have despised <WH959> the oath <WH423> in breaking <WH6565> the covenant. <WH1285>
Nevertheless I will remember <WH2142> my covenant <WH1285> with you in the days <WH3117> of your youth, <WH5271> and I will establish <WH6965> to you a everlasting <WH5769> covenant. <WH1285>

Then you shall remember <WH2142> your ways, <WH1870> and be ashamed, <WH3637> when you shall receive <WH3947> your sisters, <WH269> your elder <WH1419> sisters and your younger; <WH6996> and I will give <WH5414> them to you for daughters, <WH1323> but not by your covenant. <WH1285>
I will establish <WH6965> my covenant <WH1285> with you; <WH3045> and you shall know that I am Yahweh; <WH3068>

that you may remember, <WH2142> and be confounded, <WH954> and never open <WH6610> your mouth <WH6310> any more, <WH6440> because of your shame, <WH3639> when I have forgiven <WH3722> you all that you have done, <WH6213> says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh. <WH3069>
